https://raw.githubusercontent.com/realde:
name: Update Vector Store

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  update-vector-store:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Check out repository
      uses: actions/checkout@v4

    - name: Set up Python
      uses: actions/setup-python@v4
      with:
        python-version: '3.x'

    - name: Install dependencies
      run: |
        python -m pip install --upgrade pip
        pip install requests chardet

    - name: Update Vector Store
      env:
        GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
        OPENAI_API_KEY: ${{ secrets.OPENAI_API_KEY }}
      run: |
        python update_vector_store.py

    - name: Commit cdpt_repo.json to repository
      env:
        PAT_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.PAT_TOKEN }}
      run: |
        git config --global user.name 'github-actions[bot]'
        git config --global user.email 'github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com'
        git add cdpt_repo.json
        git commit -m "Add cdpt_repo.json"
        git pull --rebase https://x-access-token:${{ secrets.PAT_TOKEN }}@github.com/realdecimalist/cdpt-on-iagon.git main
        git push https://x-access-token:${{ secrets.PAT_TOKEN }}@github.com/realdecimalist/cdpt-on-iagon.git HEAD:main

    - name: Display scraper log
      run: cat scraper.log

# cdpt-on-iagon

**cDPT - The Only AI Assistant Developers Will Ever Need For Cardano**

Welcome to cDPT, an AI-powered assistant designed to revolutionize the way developers build dApps and games on the Cardano blockchain. Built on Iagon Compute with Iagon Storage integration, cDPT offers seamless chat history management, real-time data retrieval, and comprehensive guidance on Cardano development tools, languages, SDKs, and APIs.

## Features

- **Login with Discord**: Click the 'Login with Discord' button to authenticate and access premium features.
- **Interact with cDPT**: Use the chat interface to ask questions and receive detailed guidance on Cardano development.
- **Iagon Compute Integration**: Leverage the power of Iagon Compute for efficient and scalable AI processing.
- **Iagon Storage Integration**: Manage chat history effortlessly with Iagon Storage, ensuring your conversations are always accessible.
- **Maestro API Integration**: Fetch current epoch details and Cardano Native Token ADA/IAG market prices in real-time.
- **Comprehensive Documentation**: Access detailed knowledge of all documentation surrounding development using Iagon, Maestro, and Wanchain.

Test the dApp now at: [https://holy-feather-0522.iagon.io/](https://holy-feather-0522.iagon.io/)

Built on Iagon Compute with Iagon Storage integration, cDPT offers seamless chat history management, real-time data retrieval, and comprehensive guidance on Cardano development tools, languages, SDKs, and APIs.\n\n## Features\n\n- **Login with Discord**: Click the 'Login with Discord' button to authenticate and access premium features.\n- **Interact with cDPT**: Use the chat interface to ask questions and receive detailed guidance on Cardano development.\n- **Iagon Compute Integration**: Leverage the power of Iagon Compute for efficient and scalable AI processing.\n- **Iagon Storage Integration**: Manage chat history effortlessly with Iagon Storage, ensuring your conversations are always accessible.\n- **Maestro API Integration**: Fetch current epoch details and Cardano Native Token ADA/IAG market prices in real-time.\n- **Comprehensive Documentation**: Access detailed knowledge of all documentation surrounding development using Iagon, Maestro, and Wanchain.\n\nTest the dApp now at: [https://holy-feather-0522.iagon.io/](https://holy-feather-0522.iagon.io/)\n",
    "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/realdecimalist/cdpt-on-iagon/main/build.js": "import { exec } from 'child_process';\nimport { promisify } from 'util';\nimport fs from 'fs';\nimport path from 'path';\n\nconst execPromise = promisify(exec);\n\nasync function cleanDist() {\n    if (fs.existsSync('dist')) {\n        fs.rmSync('dist', { recursive: true, force: true });\n    }\n}\n\nasync function copyFiles(src, dest) {\n    const entries = fs.readdirSync(src, { withFileTypes: true });\n    fs.mkdirSync(dest, { recursive: true });\n\n    for (let entry of entries) {\n        const srcPath = path.join(src, entry.name);\n        const destPath = path.join(dest, entry.name);\n\n        if (entry.isDirectory()) {\n            await copyFiles(srcPath, destPath);\n        } else {\n            fs.copyFileSync(srcPath, destPath);\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nasync function build() {\n    try {\n        await cleanDist();\n        await copyFiles('src', 'dist');\n        console.log('Build completed successfully.');\n    } catch (error) {\n        console.error('Failed to build app:', error);\n        process.exit(1);\n    }\n}\n\nbuild();\n",

"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/realdecimalist/cdpt-on-iagon/main/update_vector_store.py": "import requests\\nimport json\\nimport time\\nimport logging\\nimport chardet\\nimport os\\nfrom base64 import b64encode\\n\\n# Configure logging\\nlog_file_path = 'scraper.log'\\nlogging.basicConfig(filename=log_file_path, level=logging.DEBUG, format='%(asctime)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s')\\n\\nGITHUB_API_URL = \"https://api.github.com/repos/realdecimalist/cdpt-on-iagon/contents/\"\\nTOKEN = os.getenv('GITHUB_TOKEN')\\nHEADERS = {\\n    \"Accept\": \"application/vnd.github.v3+json\",\\n    \"Authorization\": f\"token {TOKEN}\"\\n}\\n\\ndef get_repo_contents(url):\\n    logging.info(f\"Fetching repository contents from URL: {url}\")\\n    try:\\n        response = requests.get(url, headers=HEADERS)\\n        response.raise_for_status()  # Raise HTTPError for bad responses\\n        logging.info(f\"Successfully fetched repository contents from URL: {url}\")\\n        return response.json()\\n    except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e:\\n        logging.error(f\"Request error for URL {url}: {e}\")\\n        return None\\n\\ndef get_all_files(url, file_list):\\n    logging.info(f\"Getting all files from URL: {url}\")\\n    contents = get_repo_contents(url)\\n    if not contents:\\n        logging.error(f\"No contents found at URL: {url}\")\\n        return\\n    for item in contents:\\n        if item['type'] == 'file':\\n            file_list.append(item['download_url'])\\n            logging.info(f\"Added file URL: {item['download_url']}\")\\n        elif item['type'] == 'dir':\\n            get_all_files(item['url'], file_list)\\n\\ndef get_url_content(url):\\n    logging.info(f\"Fetching content from URL: {url}\")\\n    try:\\n        response = requests.get(url)\\n        response.raise_for_status()  # Raise HTTPError for bad responses\\n        logging.info(f\"Successfully fetched content from URL: {url}\")\\n        return response.content\\n    except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e:\\n        logging.error(f\"Request error for URL {url}: {e}\")\\n        return None\\n\\ndef update_content(url_list):\\n    logging.info(\"Updating content from URL list\")\\n    data = {}\\n\\n    for url in url_list:\\n        logging.info(f\"Requesting URL: {url}\")\\n        content = get_url_content(url)\\n\\n        if content:\\n            # Detect the encoding of the content\\n            result = chardet.detect(content)\\n            encoding = result['encoding']\\n            confidence = result['confidence']\\n\\n            if encoding is None or confidence < 0.5:\\n                logging.warning(f\"Low confidence in detected encoding for URL {url}. Falling back to utf-8.\")\\n                encoding = 'utf-8'  # Fallback encoding\\n\\n            logging.info(f\"Detected encoding for URL {url}: {encoding} with confidence {confidence}\")\\n\\n            try:\\n                decoded_content = content.decode(encoding)\\n            except UnicodeDecodeError as e:\\n                logging.error(f\"Unicode decode error for URL {url} with detected encoding {encoding}: {e}\")\\n                continue  # Skip this URL\\n\\n            # Log the response content for debugging\\n            logging.debug(f\"Content for URL {url}: {decoded_content[:500]}...\")  # Log only first 500 characters\\n\\n            data[url] = decoded_content\\n        else:\\n            logging.error(f\"Failed to retrieve content for URL: {url}\")\\n\\n        time.sleep(1)  # Respectful delay to avoid hitting server too hard\\n\\n    return data\\n\\ndef sanitize_json(data):\\n    \"\"\"Sanitize JSON data by removing unnecessary whitespace and escape sequences.\"\"\"\\n    sanitized_data = {}\\n    for key, value in data.items():\\n        sanitized_key = key.strip()\\n        sanitized_value = value.replace('\\n', '\\\\n').replace('\\r', '\\\\r').replace('\\t', '\\\\t')\\n        sanitized_data[sanitized_key] = sanitized_value\\n    return sanitized_data\\n\\ndef validate_json(json_data_str):\\n    \"\"\"Validate JSON data and log specific invalid characters.\"\"\"\\n    try:\\n        json.loads(json_data_str)\\n        return True\\n    except json.JSONDecodeError as e:\\n        logging.error(f\"JSONDecodeError: {e.msg} at line {e.lineno} column {e.colno} (char {e.pos})\")\\n        # Log the specific character causing the error\\n        error_position = e.pos\\n        invalid_char = json_data_str[error_position:error_position+10]  # Log 10 characters around the error\\n        logging.error(f\"Invalid JSON character(s) near: {invalid_char}\")\\n        return False\\n\\ndef commit_to_github(file_path, repo, branch, commit_message):\\n    \"\"\"Commit a file to a GitHub repository.\"\"\"\\n    with open(file_path, 'rb') as file:\\n        content = file.read()\\n    encoded_content = b64encode(content).decode('utf-8')\\n\\n    url = f\"https://api.github.com/repos/{repo}/contents/{os.path.basename(file_path)}\"\\n    data = {\\n        \"message\": commit_message,\\n        \"content\": encoded_content,\\n        \"branch\": branch\\n    }\\n\\n    response = requests.put(url, headers=HEADERS, data=json.dumps(data))\\n    if response.status_code == 201:\\n        logging.info(f\"Successfully committed {file_path} to {repo} on branch {branch}\")\\n    else:\\n        logging.error(f\"Failed to commit {file_path} to {repo}: {response.text}\")\\n\\ndef upload_to_vector_store(file_path):\\n    \"\"\"Upload the JSON file to the OpenAI vector store.\"\"\"\\n    openai_api_key = os.getenv('OPENAI_API_KEY')\\n    if not openai_api_key:\\n        logging.error(\"OPENAI_API_KEY is not set.\")\\n        return\\n\\n    vector_store_id = os.getenv('VECTOR_STORE_ID')\\n    headers = {\\n        'Authorization': f'Bearer {openai_api_key}',\\n        'Content-Type': 'application/json',\\n        'OpenAI-Beta': 'assistants=v2'\\n    }\\n    url = f'https://api.openai.com/v1/vector_stores/{vector_store_id}/files'\\n    logging.info(f\"Uploading {file_path} to {url}\")\\n\\n    with open(file_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:\\n        json_data = json.load(f)\\n        json_data_str = json.dumps(json_data)\\n\\n    if not validate_json(json_data_str):\\n        logging.error(\"JSON validation failed. Aborting upload.\")\\n        return\\n\\n    # Include the file_id parameter\\n    payload = {\\n        \"file_id\": os.path.basename(file_path),\\n        \"data\": json_data\\n    }\\n\\n    response = requests.post(url, headers=headers, data=json.dumps(payload))\\n    if response.status_code == 200:\\n        logging.info(\"Successfully updated the vector store.\")\\n    else:\\n        logging.error(f\"Failed to update the vector store: {response.text}\")\\n        logging.debug(f\"Response status code: {response.status_code}\")\\n        logging.debug(f\"Response headers: {response.headers}\")\\n        logging.debug(f\"Response content: {response.content}\")\\n\\ndef main():\\n    logging.info(\"Starting main function\")\\n    file_list = []\\n    get_all_files(GITHUB_API_URL, file_list)\\n\\n    if not file_list:\\n        logging.error(\"Failed to retrieve file list from the GitHub repository.\")\\n        return\\n\\n    updated_data = update_content(file_list)\\n    sanitized_data = sanitize_json(updated_data)\\n\\n    output_file_path = 'cdpt_repo.json'\\n    logging.info(f\"Writing updated data to {output_file_path}\")\\n    with open(output_file_path, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as file:\\n        json.dump(sanitized_data, file, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)\\n\\n    logging.info(f\"Checking if {output_file_path} exists\")\\n    if not os.path.exists(output_file_path):\\n        logging.error(f\"{output_file_path} does not exist.\")\\n        return\\n\\n    # Commit the file to GitHub\\n    repo = \"realdecimalist/cdpt-on-iagon\"\\n    branch = \"main\"\\n    commit_message = \"Add cdpt_repo.json\"\\n    commit_to_github(output_file_path, repo, branch, commit_message)\\n\\n    logging.info(f\"{output_file_path} exists. Proceeding to upload to OpenAI Vector Store\")\\n\\n    # Upload to OpenAI Vector Store\\n    upload_to_vector_store(output_file_path)\\n\\n    # Log the entire content of the scraper.log file\\n    with open(log_file_path, 'r') as log_file:\\n        log_content = log_file.read()\\n        logging.info(f\"Scraper log content:\\n{log_content}\")\\n\\nif __name__ == \"__main__\":\\n    logging.info(\"Script execution started\")\\n    main()\\n    logging.info(\"Script execution completed\")",\n    "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/realdecimalist/cdpt-on-iagon/main/webpack.config.js": "const path = require('path');\\n\\nmodule.exports = {\\n    entry: './src/index.js',\\n    output: {\\n        filename: 'bundle.js',\\n        path: path.resolve(__dirname, 'dist')\\n    },\\n    module: {\\n        rules: [\\n            {\\n                test: /\\.js$/,\\n                exclude: /node_modules/,\\n                use: {\\n                    loader: 'babel-loader',\\n                    options: {\\n                        presets: ['@babel/preset-env']\\n                    }\\n                }\\n            },\\n            {\\n                test: /\\.css$/,\\n                use: ['style-loader', 'css-loader']\\n            }\\n        ]\\n    }\\n};\\n"\n}",

content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">\n    <title>cDPT AI Chatbot</title>\n    <style>\n        @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Anybody:wght@400;700&display=swap');\n        body {\n            font-family: 'Anybody', sans-serif;\n            background-color: #000;\n            color: #fff;\n            margin: 0;\n            padding: 0;\n            display: flex;\n            justify-content: center;\n            align-items: flex-start;\n            min-height: 100vh;\n            overflow: auto;\n        }\n        .container {\n            max-width: 1400px;\n            width: 100%;\n            padding: 20px;\n            background-color: #000;\n            box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);\n            margin-top: 20px;\n            display: flex;\n        }\n        .toolbar {\n            width: 200px;\n            background-color: #333;\n            padding: 20px;\n            display: flex;\n            flex-direction: background-color: #007bff;\n            border: none;\n            color: white;\n            padding: 10px;\n            margin-bottom: 10px;\n            text-align: center;\n            font-size: 16px;\n            cursor: pointer;\n            border-radius: 4px;\n        }\n        .toolbar button:last-child {\n            margin-bottom: 0; /* Remove margin from the last button */\n        }\n        .toolbar button:hover {\n            background-color: #0056b3;\n        }\n        .content {\n            flex: 1;\n            text-align: center;\n        }\n        h1 {\n            color: #fff;\n        }\n        h3 {\n            font-weight: normal;\n            font-style: italic;\n            color: #fff;\n        }\n        .chat-box {\n            max-height: 1000px;\n            overflow-y: auto;\n            border: 1px solid #333;\n            padding: 10px;\n            margin-bottom: 20px;\n            background-color: #333;\n            color: #fff;\n        }\n        .chat-message {\n            margin-bottom: 10px;\n            padding: 10px;\n            border-radius: 5px;\n            width: fit-content;\n            max-width: 100%;\n            word-wrap: break-word;\n            white-space: pre-wrap;\n            position: relative;\n        }\n        .chat-message.user {\n            background-color: #777;\n            align-self: flex-end;\n            margin-left: auto;\n            text-align: right;\n        }\n        .chat-message.bot {\n            background-color: #555;\n            align-self: flex-start;\n            margin-right: auto;\n            text-align: left;\n        }\n        .chat-message code {\n            background-color: #222;\n            padding: 5px;\n            border-radius: 3px;\n            display: block;\n            white-space: pre;\n            overflow-x: auto;\n        }\n        .chat-message pre code {\n            display: block;\n        }\n        .input-group {\n            margin-bottom: 20px;\n            text-align: left;\n        }\n        .input-group label {\n            display: block;\n            margin-bottom: 5px;\n            color: #fff;\n        }\n        .input-group textarea {\n            width: 100%;\n            padding: 10px;\n            border: 1px solid #333;\n            border-radius: 5px;\n            resize: vertical;\n            height: auto;\n            min-height: 100px;\n            background-color: #444;\n            color: #fff;\n            overflow: auto;\n        }\n        .button-group {\n            display: flex;\n            justify-content: center;\n            gap: 10px;\n        }\n        .button {\n            display: inline-flex;\n            align-items: center;\n            justify-content: center;\n            width: auto;\n            padding: 10px;\n            background-color: #007bff;\n            color: #fff;\n            border: none;\n            border-radius: 5px;\n            cursor: background-color: #0056b3;\n        }\n        .hidden {\n            display: none;\n        }\n        #logo {\n            max-width: 60%;\n            height: auto;\n            margin-bottom: 20px;\n            transition: opacity 0.5s ease-in-out;\n        }\n        .typing #logo {\n            animation: pulse 1s infinite alternate;\n        }\n        @keyframes pulse {\n            0% {\n                opacity: 1;\n            }\n            100% {\n                opacity: 0.5;\n            }\n        }\n        .copy-button {\n            position: absolute;\n            top: cursor: pointer;\n            text-align: center;\n            text-decoration: none;\n        }\n        .copy-button:hover {\n            background-color: #0056b3;\n        }\n    </style>\n</head>\n<body>\n    <div class="container">\n        <div class="toolbar">\n            <button class="button" onclick="getCurrentEpochDetails()">Get Current Cardano Epoch Details</button>\n            <button class="button" id="get-price-button">Get Cardano Token Market Price</button>\n            <button class="button" onclick="getLatestBitcoinBlock()">Get Latest Bitcoin Block</button>\n            <button class="button" onclick="getBitcoinChainInfo()">Get Bitcoin Chain Info</button>\n            <button class="button" onclick="getLatestDogecoinBlock()">Get Latest Dogecoin Block</button>\n            <button class="button" onclick="getDogecoinChainInfo()">Get Dogecoin Chain Info</button>\n            <button id="connect-wanchain-wallet">Connect Wanchain Wallet</button>\n        </div>\n        <div class="content">\n            <img id="logo" src="https://i.ibb.co/rsvpknc/FPS-Logo-Color-only.png" alt="Your Logo">\n            <h1>cDPT</h1>\n            <h3>The Only AI Assistant You Will Ever Need For Cardano</h3>\n            <button class="button" id="login-button" onclick="loginWithDiscord()">\n                <img src="https://i.ibb.co/89Qrp66/discord-mark-white.png" alt="Discord Logo" width="20" height="20">\n                Login with Discord\n            </button>\n            <div id="chat-container" class="hidden">\n                <div class="chat-box" id="chat-box"></div>\n                <div class="input-group">\n                    <label for="message">Message</label>\n                    <textarea id="message" placeholder="Enter your message here..."></textarea>\n                </div>\n                <div class="button-group">\n                    <button class="button" onclick="confirmClearChat()">Clear Chat</button>\n                    <button class="button" onclick="sendMessage()">Send Message</button>\n                    <button class="button" onclick="loadPreviousChat('669286a6143a8475482c3e05')">Load Previous Chat</button>\n                </div>\n            </div>\n        </div>\n    </div>\n    <script>\n        let clientId;\n        let discordId;\n        let threadId;\n        const WHITELISTED_USER_IDS = ['410954739547766795', '780451451100200971', '824443775928762368', '669626899655557130'];\n\n        async function fetchConfig() {\n            try {\n                const response = await fetch('/config');\n                const data = await response.json();\n                clientId = data.clientId;\n                console.log('Fetched config:', data);\n            } catch (error) {\n                console.error('Error fetching config:', error);\n            }\n        }\n\n        async function loginWithDiscord() {\n            if (!clientId) {\n                await fetchConfig();\n            }\n\n            const redirectUri = encodeURIComponent('https://holy-feather-0522.iagon.io');\n            const scope = encodeURIComponent('identify applications.entitlements');\n            const responseType = 'code';\n            const authUrl = `https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=${clientId}&redirect_uri=${redirectUri}&response_type=${responseType}&scope=${scope}`;\n            console.log('Redirecting to Discord auth URL:', authUrl);\n            window.location.href = authUrl;\n        }\n\n        async function handleCallback() {\n            const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\n            const code = urlParams.get('code');\n            if (code) {\n                console.log('Authorization Code:', code);\n                const tokenResponse = await fetch('https://holy-feather-0522.iagon.io/discord/token', {\n                    method: 'POST',\n                    headers: {\n                        'Content-Type': 'application/json'\n                    },\n                    body: JSON.stringify({ code })\n                });\n                const tokenData = await tokenResponse.json();\n                console.log('Token Data:', tokenData);\n                const accessToken = tokenData.access_token;\n\n                localStorage.setItem('accessToken', accessToken);\n\n                const userResponse = await fetch('https://discord.com/api/users/@me', {\n                    headers: {\n                        'Authorization': `Bearer ${accessToken}`\n                    }\n                });\n                const userData = await userResponse.json();\n                console.log('User Data:', userData);\n\n                if (WHITELISTED_USER_IDS.includes(userData.id)) {\n                    // User is whitelisted, allow direct access\n                    discordId = userData.id;\n                    localStorage.setItem('discordId', discordId);\n                    console.log(`User ${userData.id} is whitelisted.`);\n                    document.getElementById('login-button').classList.add('hidden');\n                    document.getElementById('chat-container').classList.remove('hidden');\n                    return;\n                }\n\n                const entitlementsResponse = await fetch(`https://holy-feather-0522.iagon.io/discord/entitlements?accessToken=${accessToken}`);\n                const entitlements = await entitlementsResponse.json();\n                console.log('Entitlements:', entitlements);\n\n                if (entitlements && Array.isArray(entitlements) && entitlements.length > 0) {\n                    discordId = entitlements[0].user_id;\n                    localStorage.setItem('discordId', discordId);\n                    console.log('Saved discordId to localStorage:', discordId);\n                } else {\n                    console.error('No entitlements found or entitlements format is incorrect.');\n                }\n\n                const hasSubscription = entitlements && Array.isArray(entitlements) && entitlements.some(entitlement => entitlement.sku_id === '1255974004552892486' && !entitlement.deleted && (!entitlement.ends_at || new Date(entitlement.ends_at) > new Date()));\n                console.log('Has active subscription:', hasSubscription);\n\n                if (hasSubscription) {\n                    document.getElementById('login-button').classList.add('hidden');\n                    document.getElementById('chat-container').classList.remove('hidden');\n                } else {\n                    alert('This command requires a premium subscription! Upgrade now to get access to these features!');\n                    window.location.href = 'https://discord.com/application-directory/1254680166664507413/store';\n                }\n            } else {\n                const storedAccessToken = localStorage.getItem('accessToken');\n                discordId = localStorage.getItem('discordId');\n                console.log('Retrieved discordId from localStorage:', discordId);\n                if (!storedAccessToken || !discordId) {\n                    loginWithDiscord();\n                } else {\n                    const entitlementsResponse = await fetch(`https://holy-feather-0522.iagon.io/discord/entitlements?accessToken=${storedAccessToken}`);\n                    const entitlements = await entitlementsResponse.json();\n                    const hasSubscription = entitlements && Array.isArray(entitlements) && entitlements.some(entitlement => entitlement.sku_id === '1255974004552892486' && !entitlement.deleted && (!entitlement.ends_at || new Date(entitlement.ends_at) > new Date()));\n                    if (hasSubscription) {\n                        document.getElementById('login-button').classList.add('hidden');\n                        document.getElementById('chat-container').classList.remove('hidden');\n                    } else {\n                        alert('This command requires a premium subscription! Upgrade now to get access to these features!');\n                        window.location.href = 'https://discord.com/application-directory/1254680166664507413/store';\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        function escapeHtml(unsafe) {\n            return unsafe\n                .replace(/&/g, "&")\n                .replace(/</g, "<")\n                .replace(/>/g, ">")\n                .replace(/"/g, """)\n                .replace(/'/g, "'");\n        }\n\n        async function sendMessage(callback) {\n            console.log('Send message button clicked.');\n            let message = document.getElementById('message').value;\n\n            if (!message) {\n                console.log('Message is empty, not sending.');\n                return;\n            }\n\n            // Escape HTML characters in user input\n            message = escapeHtml(message);\n\n            const chatBox = document.getElementById('chat-box');\n            addMessageToChat('user', message);\n            document.getElementById('message').value = ''; // Clear the message field\n            document.getElementById('message').focus(); // Focus the message field\n            console.log('Message field cleared and focused.');\n\n            const typingIndicator = document.createElement('div');\n            typingIndicator.className = 'chat-message bot';\n            typingIndicator.textContent = 'Thinking...';\n            typingIndicator.id = 'typingIndicator';\n            chatBox.appendChild(typingIndicator);\n            chatBox.scrollTop = chatBox.scrollHeight;\n            console.log('Added typing indicator.');\n\n            document.getElementById('logo').classList.add('typing');\n\n            try {\n                // Check if threadId exists in local storage\n                threadId = localStorage.getItem('threadId');\n                if (!threadId) {\n                    // Create a new thread if it doesn't exist\n                    const threadResponse = await fetch('https://afe2am4o4cexr5ccxicifawnga0aqxqc.lambda-url.us-east-1.on.aws/', {\n                        method: 'POST',\n                        headers: {\n                            'Content-Type': 'application/json'\n                        },\n                        body: JSON.stringify({ message })\n                    });\n                    const threadData = await threadResponse.json();\n                    threadId = threadData.threadId;\n                    localStorage.setItem('threadId', threadId); // Store the new threadId in local storage\n                }\n\n                const response = await fetch('https://afe2am4o4cexr5ccxicifawnga0aqxqc.lambda-url.us-east-1.on.aws/', {\n                    method: 'POST',\n                    headers: {\n                        'Content-Type': 'application/json'\n                    },\n                    body: JSON.stringify({ message, threadId }) // Send the threadId with the message\n                });\n\n                const data = await response.json();\n\n                if (typingIndicator && typingIndicator.parentNode === chatBox) {\n                    chatBox.removeChild(typingIndicator);\n                    console.log('Removed typing indicator.');\n                }\n\n                document.getElementById('logo').classList.remove('typing');\n\n                if (response.ok) {\n                    // Send the received message to the server for Markdown processing\n                    const htmlContentResponse = await fetch('/process-markdown', {\n                        method: 'POST',\n                        headers: {\n                            'Content-Type': 'application/json'\n                        },\n                        body: JSON.stringify({ markdownText: data.message })\n                    });\n                    const htmlContentData = await htmlContentResponse.json();\n\n                    addMessageToChat('bot', htmlContentData.htmlContent);\n                    console.log('Bot response received:', data.message);\n                } else {\n                    addMessageToChat('bot', `Error: ${data.error}`);\n                    console.error('Bot response error:', data.error);\n                }\n\n                const chatHistory = Array.from(chatBox.children).map(child => ({\n                    sender: child.classList.contains('user') ? 'user' : 'bot',\n                    text: child.innerHTML\n                }));\n\n                try {\n                    await fetch('/save-chat', {\n                        method: 'POST',\n                        headers: {\n                            'Content-Type': 'application/json'\n                        },\n                        body: JSON.stringify({ discordId, chatHistory })\n                    });\n                    console.log('Chat history saved for discordId:', discordId);\n                } catch (saveError) {\n                    console.error('Failed to save chat history:', saveError);\n                    addMessageToChat('bot', 'Warning: Failed to save chat history. You can continue chatting, but the conversation will not be saved.');\n                }\n\n            } catch (error) {\n                if (typingIndicator && typingIndicator.parentNode === chatBox) {\n                    chatBox.removeChild(typingIndicator);\n                    console.log('Removed typing indicator.');\n                }\n\n                document.getElementById('logo').classList.remove('typing');\n\n                addMessageToChat('bot', `Error: ${error.message}`);\n                console.error('Error sending message:', error.message);\n            }\n        }\n\n        document.getElementById('message').addEventListener('keypress', function (event) {\n            if (event.key === 'Enter' && !event.shiftKey) {\n                event.preventDefault();\n                sendMessage();\n            }\n        });\n\n        async function loadPreviousChat(fileId) {\n            console.log('Load previous chat button clicked.');\n            console.log('Loading chat history for fileId:', fileId);\n            try {\n                const response = await fetch(`/load-chat?fileId=${encodeURIComponent(fileId)}`);\n                if (!response.ok) {\n                    const errorData = await response.json();\n                    console.error('Failed to load chat history:', errorData);\n                    throw new Error('Failed to load chat history');\n                }\n                const chatHistory = await response.json();\n                console.log('Loaded chat history:', chatHistory);\n\n                const sortedChatHistory = sortMessagesByTimestamp(chatHistory);\n\n                for (const message of sortedChatHistory) {\n                    const htmlContentResponse = await fetch('/process-markdown', {\n                        method: 'POST',\n                        headers: {\n                            'Content-Type': 'application/json'\n                        },\n                        body: JSON.stringify({ markdownText: message.text })\n                    });\n                    const htmlContentData = await htmlContentResponse.json();\n                    addMessageToChat(message.sender, htmlContentData.htmlContent, message.timestamp);\n                }\n            } catch (error) {\n                console.error('Error loading chat history:', error);\n                alert('Failed to load chat history');\n            }\n        }\n\n        function sortMessagesByTimestamp(messages) {\n            return messages.sort((a, b) => b.timestamp - a.timestamp);\n        }\n\n        function addMessageToChat(sender, message, timestamp) {\n            const chatBox = document.getElementById('chat-box');\n            const messageDiv = document.createElement('div');\n            messageDiv.className = `chat-message ${sender}`;\n            messageDiv.setAttribute('data-timestamp', timestamp); // Add timestamp as a data attribute\n            messageDiv.innerHTML = message; // Use innerHTML to correctly display HTML content\n\n            chatBox.appendChild(messageDiv);\n\n            // Sort messages by timestamp after adding a new message\n            const messages = Array.from(chatBox.children);\n            const sortedMessages = sortMessagesByTimestamp(messages);\n\n            // Clear chat box and append sorted messages\n            chatBox.innerHTML = '';\n            sortedMessages.forEach(msg => chatBox.appendChild(msg));\n\n            chatBox.scrollTop = chatBox.scrollHeight;\n            console.log('Added message to chat:', { sender, message });\n        }\n\n        function typeMessage(element, message) {\n            let index = 0;\n            const chatBox = document.getElementById('chat-box');\n            function type() {\n                if (index < message.length) {\n                    element.innerHTML = message.substring(0, index + 1);\n                    index++;\n                    chatBox.scrollTop = chatBox.scrollHeight;\n\n                    setTimeout(type, 1);\n\n                }\n            }\n            setTimeout(type, 1);\n            console.log('Started typing effect for message:', message);\n        }\n\n        function confirmClearChat() {\n            const confirmation = confirm("Are you sure you want to clear the chat? This action cannot be undone and you will not be able to continue the conversation from the previous thread.");\n            if (confirmation) {\n                clearChat();\n            }\n        }\n\n        function clearChat() {\n            console.log('Clear chat button clicked.');\n            const chatBox = document.getElementById('chat-box');\n            chatBox.innerHTML = '';\n            localStorage.removeItem('threadId'); // Clear the threadId from local storage\n            console.log('Chat cleared.');\n        }\n\n        function copyToClipboard(text) {\n            const textarea = document.createElement('textarea');\n            textarea.value = text;\n            document.body.appendChild(textarea);\n            textarea.select();\n            document.execCommand('copy');\n            document.body.removeChild(textarea);\n            alert('Copied to clipboard');\n            console.log('Copied to clipboard:', text);\n        }\n\n        async function getCurrentEpochDetails() {\n            try {\n                const chatBox = document.getElementById('chat-box');\n                const typingIndicator = document.createElement('div');\n                typingIndicator.className = 'chat-message bot';\n                typingIndicator.textContent = 'Fetching epoch details...';\n                typingIndicator.id = 'typingIndicator';\n                chatBox.appendChild(typingIndicator);\n                chatBox.scrollTop = chatBox.scrollHeight;\n\n                const response = await fetch('/get-current-epoch-details');\n                if (!response.ok) {\n                    const errorData = await response.json();\n                    console.error('Failed to fetch current epoch details:', errorData);\n                    addMessageToChat('bot', 'Failed to fetch current epoch details');\n                    return;\n                }\n\n                const data = await response.json();\n                const epochDetails = `Current Epoch Details:\n${JSON.stringify(data, null, 2)}`;\n                addMessageToChat('bot', epochDetails);\n                chatBox.removeChild(typingIndicator);\n            } catch (error) {\n                console.error('Error fetching current epoch details:', error);\n                addMessageToChat('bot', 'Error fetching current epoch details');\n            }\n\n            saveChatHistory();\n        }\n\n        async function getMarketPrice() {\n            const tokenA = 'ADA';\n            const tokenB     "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/realdecimalist/cdpt-on-iagon/main/update_vector_store.py": "import requests\nimport json\nimport time\nimport logging\nimport chardet\nimport os\nfrom base64 import b64encode\n\n# Configure logging\nlog_file_path = 'scraper.log'\nlogging.basicConfig(filename=log_file_path, level=logging.DEBUG, format='%(asctime)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s')\n\nGITHUB_API_URL = "https://api.github.com/repos/realdecimalist/cdpt-on-iagon/contents/"\nTOKEN = os.getenv('GITHUB_TOKEN')\nHEADERS = {\n    "Accept": "application/vnd.github.v3+json",\n    "Authorization": f"token {TOKEN}"\n}\n\ndef get_repo_contents(url):\n    logging.info(f"Fetching repository contents from URL: {url}")\n    try:\n        response = requests.get(url, headers=HEADERS)\n        response.raise_for_status()  # Raise HTTPError for bad responses\n        logging.info(f"Successfully fetched repository contents from URL: {url}")\n        return response.json()\n    except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e:\n        logging.error(f"Request error for URL {url}: {e}")\n        return None\n\ndef get_all_files(url, file_list):\n    logging.info(f"Getting all files from URL: {url}")\n    contents = get_repo_contents(url)\n    if not contents:\n        logging.error(f"No contents found at URL: {url}")\n        return\n    for item in contents:\n        if item['type'] == 'file':\n            file_list.append(item['download_url'])\n            logging.info(f"Added file URL: {item['download_url']}")\n        elif item['type'] == 'dir':\n            get_all_files(item['url'], file_list)\n\ndef get_url_content(url):\n    logging.info(f"Fetching content from URL: {url}")\n    try:\n        response = requests.get(url)\n        response.raise_for_status()  # Raise HTTPError for bad responses\n        logging.info(f"Successfully fetched content from URL: {url}")\n        return response.content\n    except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e:\n        logging.error(f"Request error for URL {url}: {e}")\n        return None\n\ndef update_content(url_list):\n    logging.info("Updating content from URL list")\n    data = {}\n\n    for url in url_list:\n        logging.info(f"Requesting URL: {url}")\n        content = get_url_content(url)\n\n        if content:\n            # Detect the encoding of the content\n            result = chardet.detect(content)\n            encoding = result['encoding']\n            confidence = result['confidence']\n\n            if encoding is None or confidence < 0.5:\n                logging.warning(f"Low confidence in detected encoding for URL {url}. import requests
import json
import time
import logging
import chardet
import os
from base64 import b64encode

# Configure logging
log_file_path = 'scraper.log'
logging.basicConfig(filename=log_file_path, level=logging.DEBUG, format='%(asctime)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s')

GITHUB_API_URL = "https://api.github.com/repos/realdecimalist/cdpt-on-iagon/contents/"
TOKEN = os.getenv('GITHUB_TOKEN')
HEADERS = {
    "Accept": "application/vnd.github.v3+json",
    "Authorization": f"token {TOKEN}"
}

def get_repo_contents(url):
    logging.info(f"Fetching repository contents from URL: {url}")
    try:
        response = requests.get(url, headers=HEADERS)
        response.raise_for_status()  # Raise HTTPError for bad responses
        logging.info(f"Successfully fetched repository contents from URL: {url}")
        return response.json()
    except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e:
        logging.error(f"Request error for URL {url}: {e}")
        return None

def get_all_files(url, file_list):
    logging.info(f"Getting all files from URL: {url}")
    contents = get_repo_contents(url)
    if not contents:
        logging.error(f"No contents found at URL: {url}")
        return
    for item in contents:
        if item['type'] == 'file':
            file_list.append(item['download_url'])
            logging.info(f"Added file URL: {item['download_url']}")
        elif item['type'] == 'dir':
            get_all_files(item['url'], file_list)

def get_url_content(url):
    logging.info(f"Fetching content from URL: {url}")
    try:
        response = requests.get(url)
        response.raise_for_status()  # Raise HTTPError for bad responses
        logging.info(f"Successfully fetched content from URL: {url}")
        return response.content
    except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e:
        logging.error(f"Request error for URL {url}: {e}")
        return None

def update_content(url_list):
    logging.info("Updating content from URL list")
    data = {}

    for url in url_list:
        logging.info(f"Requesting URL: {url}")
        content = get_url_content(url)

        if content:
            # Detect the encoding of the content
            result = chardet.detect(content)
            encoding = result['encoding']
            confidence = result['confidence']

            if encoding is None or confidence < 0.5:
                logging.warning(f"Low confidence in detected encoding for URL {url}. Falling back to utf-8.")
                encoding = 'utf-8'  # Fallback encoding

            logging.info(f"Detected encoding for URL {url}: {encoding} with confidence {confidence}")

            try:
                decoded_content = content.decode(encoding)
            except UnicodeDecodeError as e:
                logging.error(f"Unicode decode error for URL {url} with detected encoding {encoding}: {e}")
                continue  # Skip this URL

            # Log the response content for debugging
            logging.debug(f"Content for URL {url}: {decoded_content[:500]}...")  # Log only first 500 characters

            data[url] = decoded_content
        else:
            logging.error(f"Failed to retrieve content for URL: {url}")

        time.sleep(1)  # Respectful delay to avoid hitting server too hard

    return data

def sanitize_json(data):
    """Sanitize JSON data by removing unnecessary whitespace and escape sequences."""
    sanitized_data = {}
    for key, value in data.items():
        sanitized_key = key.strip()
        sanitized_value = value.replace('
', '\n').replace('', '\r').replace('	', '\t')
        sanitized_data[sanitized_key] = sanitized_value
    return sanitized_data

def validate_json(json_data_str):
    """Validate JSON data and log specific invalid characters."""
    try:
        json.loads(json_data_str)
        return True
    except json.JSONDecodeError as e:
        logging.error(f"JSONDecodeError: {e.msg} at line {e.lineno} column {e.colno} (char {e.pos})")
        # Log the specific character causing the error
        error_position = e.pos
        invalid_char = json_data_str[error_position:error_position+10]  # Log 10 characters around the error
        logging.error(f"Invalid JSON character(s) near: {invalid_char}")
        return False

def commit_to_github(file_path, repo, branch, commit_message):
    """Commit a file to a GitHub repository."""
    with open(file_path, 'rb') as file:
        content = file.read()
    encoded_content = b64encode(content).decode('utf-8')

    url = f"https://api.github.com/repos/{repo}/contents/{os.path.basename(file_path)}"
    data = {
        "message": commit_message,
        "content": encoded_content,
        "branch": branch
    }

    response = requests.put(url, headers=HEADERS, data=json.dumps(data))
    if response.status_code == 201:
        logging.info(f"Successfully committed {file_path} to {repo} on branch {branch}")
    else:
        logging.error(f"Failed to commit {file_path} to {repo}: {response.text}")

def upload_to_vector_store(file_path):
    """Upload the JSON file to the OpenAI vector store."""
    openai_api_key = os.getenv('OPENAI_API_KEY')
    if not openai_api_key:
        logging.error("OPENAI_API_KEY is not set.")
        return

    vector_store_id = 'vs_tiNayixAsoF0CJZjnkgCvXse'
    headers = {
        'Authorization': f'Bearer {openai_api_key}',
        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        'OpenAI-Beta': 'assistants=v2'
    }
    url = f'https://api.openai.com/v1/vector_stores/{vector_store_id}/files'
    logging.info(f"Uploading {file_path} to {url}")

    with open(file_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
        json_data = json.load(f)
        json_data_str = json.dumps(json_data)

    if not validate_json(json_data_str):
        logging.error("JSON validation failed. Aborting upload.")
        return

    # Include the file_id parameter 
    payload = {
        "vector_store_id": vector_store_id,
        "file_id": os.path.basename(file_path)
    }

    response = requests.post(url, headers=headers, data=json.dumps(payload))
    if response.status_code == 200:
        logging.info("Successfully updated the vector store.")
    else:
        logging.error(f"Failed to update the vector store: {response.text}")
        logging.debug(f"Response status code: {response.status_code}")
        logging.debug(f"Response headers: {response.headers}")
        logging.debug(f"Response content: {response.content}")

def main():
    logging.info("Starting main function")
    file_list = []
    get_all_files(GITHUB_API_URL, file_list)

    if not file_list:
        logging.error("Failed to retrieve file list from the GitHub repository.")
        return

    updated_data = update_content(file_list)
    sanitized_data = sanitize_json(updated_data)

    output_file_path = 'cdpt_repo.json'
    logging.info(f"Writing updated data to {output_file_path}")
    with open(output_file_path, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as file:
        json.dump(sanitized_data, file, ensure_ascii=False, indent=4)

    logging.info(f"Checking if {output_file_path} exists")
    if not os.path.exists(output_file_path):
        logging.error(f"{output_file_path} does not exist.")
        return

    # Commit the file to GitHub
    repo = "realdecimalist/cdpt-on-iagon"
    branch = "main"
    commit_message = "Add cdpt_repo.json"
    commit_to_github(output_file_path, repo, branch, commit_message)

    logging.info(f"{output_file_path} exists. Proceeding to upload to OpenAI Vector Store")

    # Upload to OpenAI Vector Store
    upload_to_vector_store(output_file_path)

    # Log the entire content of the scraper.log file
    with open(log_file_path, 'r') as log_file:
        log_content = log_file.read()
        logging.info(f"Scraper log content:
{log_content}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    logging.info("Script execution started")
    main()
    logging.info("Script execution completed")
